title: Contact Us
sub-title: Have questions or feedback? We'd love to hear from you. Our team is here to help with anything you need.
subject: Subject *

placeholders.subject: Subject (Optional)
placeholders.message: Tell us what we can help you... *

thankYou: Thank you for reaching out. We'll get back to you soon.

faqItems.question1: How do I create an account?
faqItems.answer1: You can create an account by clicking the 'Sign up' button in the top right corner of the page. You'll be asked to choose between a job seeker or company account.
faqItems.question2: Is it free to post jobs?
faqItems.answer2: We offer both free and premium job posting options. Basic job listings are free, while premium listings offer enhanced visibility and additional features.
faqItems.question3: How can I update my profile?
faqItems.answer3: Once logged in, you can update your profile by navigating to the settings page in your dashboard.
